title.content: Boost Conversions creating Pixel-Perfect Landing Pages

metaDescription.content: Build, launch and optimize landing pages at scale with a no-code platform. Increase conversion rate. Get more leads

Collections

Key Features

  • ✏️

    Build and launch landing pages at scale

    Create on-brand landing pages with the pixel-perfect builder. Update hundreds of pages using Smart Sections, a one-click update feature
  • 💡

    Optimize conversion rates with ease

    Use A/B/x testing to increase conversion rates and get more leads. Manage traffic flow and take different testing approaches (A/B/x, MVT)
  • 🚀

    Leverage page speed with global cloud hosting

    Add your domains and publish pages with enforced SSL, and use WordPress plugin or download a PHP file to keep the page on your servers

Pricing

Free trial
Free trial
$49/mo

Free 7-day trial, then $49/mo

Unsubscribe anytime

  • Unlimited landing pages
  • Unlimited conversions
  • 75,000 unique visits per month
  • Fully-featured
  • All integrations

Free 7-day trial, then $49/mo

Unsubscribe anytime

In-app purchases

Build Landing Pages That Convert

Landing pages are a well-known marketing strategy to convert visitors into customers. You can use custom landing pages to attract traffic from advertising campaigns, social media, or email marketing. Our Landing Page Builder is a one-stop shop for tech-savvy marketers who value their time and independence. Under one roof, you can quickly create, optimize, and launch hundreds of landing pages, bringing you or your clients more business. The best part? No coding required - the process is quick and easy thanks to pre-made templates made for every kind of business and website. Build via drag and drop landing page templates Landing Page Builder simplifies the process of creating high-converting landing pages. Our users’ TOP 5 features list includes: ● drag and drop and pixel-perfect builder ● manageable Mobile View and Thank You Page ● tons of free assets like icons, images, and predefined elements ● funnel and form creator for a better lead gen ● changelog (if you need to restore your previous work) Scale your work with Smart Sections If you want to use the same element on many landing pages and be sure that even the slightest change implemented in one place will show up on every other landing page, use Smart Section. Smart Section can help you with the following: ● speed up the creation process ● build section templates ● update many landing pages with one click No more copy and paste! Smart, isn’t it? Optimize conversion rates. Get more leads! Use different tactics depending on how you want to increase conversion rates: ● build personalized landing pages tailored to your audience’s age, gender, location, interest, or traffic source ● optimize landing page details using A/B testing, headers, images, or CTAs ● test different landing pages and choose the best communication strategy for your campaign Stay connected with the MarTech ecosystem Let your apps talk to each other. Browse our extensive catalog with three types of integrations: ● in-app (easy authentication) ● compatible (using code snippets) ● Zapier (connect your forms via Zapier) Connect the apps you already use or find new ones to enhance your marketing processes. Use reliable infrastructure You and your clients deserve safe cloud solutions. We deliver: ● infrastructure based on Amazon Web Services ● software and libraries update policy ● SSLs and GDPR compliance
Show more

Build and launch landing pages at scale
Create on-brand landing pages with the pixel-perfect builder. Update hundreds of pages using Smart Sections, a one-click update feature
💡
Optimize conversion rates with ease
Use A/B/x testing to increase conversion rates and get more leads. Manage traffic flow and take different testing approaches (A/B/x, MVT)

Fully-featured
All integrations
In-app purchases
Build Landing Pages That Convert
Landing pages are a well-known marketing strategy to convert visitors into customers. You can use custom landing pages to attract traffic from advertising campaigns, social media, or email marketing. 

Our Landing Page Builder is a one-stop shop for tech-savvy marketers who value their time and independence. Under one roof, you can quickly create, optimize, and launch hundreds of landing pages, bringing you or your clients more business. 

The best part? No coding required - the process is quick and easy thanks to pre-made templates made for every kind of business and website. 

Build via drag and drop landing page templates

Landing Page Builder simplifies the process of creating high-converting landing pages.
Our users’ TOP 5 features list includes:
● drag and drop and pixel-perfect builder
● manageable Mobile View and Thank You Page
● tons of free assets like icons, images, and predefined elements
● funnel and form creator for a better lead gen 
● changelog (if you need to restore your previous work)

Scale your work with Smart Sections

If you want to use the same element on many landing pages and be sure that even the slightest change implemented in one place will show up on every other landing page, use Smart Section. Smart Section can help you with the following:
● speed up the creation process
● build section templates
● update many landing pages with one click 
No more copy and paste!  Smart, isn’t it? 

Optimize conversion rates. Get more leads!

Use different tactics depending on how you want to increase conversion rates:
● build personalized landing pages tailored to your audience’s age, gender, location, interest, or traffic source
● optimize landing page details using A/B testing, headers, images, or CTAs
● test different landing pages and choose the best communication strategy for your campaign

Stay connected with the MarTech ecosystem
Let your apps talk to each other. Browse our extensive catalog with three types of integrations:
● in-app (easy authentication)
● compatible (using code snippets)
● Zapier (connect your forms via Zapier)
Connect the apps you already use or find new ones to enhance your marketing processes.

Use reliable infrastructure

You and your clients deserve safe cloud solutions. We deliver: 
● infrastructure based on Amazon Web Services 
● software and libraries update policy 
● SSLs and GDPR compliance
Show more
